title: Mom pleads guilty in 4-year-old's accidental shooting death
content:
NORTH PHILADELPHIA (WPVI) --
A North Philadelphia woman accepted blame Wednesday for her young child's accidental shooting death.
Twenty-six-year-old Shakeya Holmes pleaded guilty to involuntary manslaughter and related offenses.
It was back in June when her 4-year-old daughter Sani found a gun in a closet and shot herself.
Holmes will be sentenced in March.
Her boyfriend Demetrius Williams is also facing charges.
